event.title: today for the Christian liberal arts college, Messiah College, whose students make

data.event: Grantham is an unincorporated community in Upper Allen Township, Cumberland County, in the U.S. state of Pennsylvania, best known today for the Christian liberal arts college, Messiah College, whose students make up most of its population.

event.title: 25 years old - if you only count

data.event: The population of Grantham is 85-90% between the ages of 18 and 25 years old - if you only count the student population.
It was destroyed by fire prior to 1957 and stood derelict for many years; eventually it was demolished to provide a new maintenance facility for the growing college.
